image-reference.title: Site cut and fill using un-retained embankments — Site cut commencing at the allotment boundary or affecting an adjoining property

image.alt: Site cut and fill using un-retained embankments — Site cut commencing at the allotment boundary or affecting an adjoining property

ol.li: The angle for line A-A is defined as the maximum embankment slope ratio H:L in Table 3.2.1 and is taken from the bottom of the footing and identifies the area suitable for excavation.
Consideration must be given for drainage of surface water, particularly where fill affects an adjoining property.
